001
002package com.commercetools.api.client.error;
003
004import com.commercetools.api.models.error.ConcurrentModificationError;
005import com.commercetools.api.models.error.ErrorResponse;
006
007import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ApiHttpHeaders;
008import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ApiHttpRequest;
009import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ApiHttpResponse;
010import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ResponseSerializer;
011
012/**
013 * Deserializes the response payload as {@link ErrorResponse} and extracts the currentVersion of the modified resource
014 * if included
015 */
016public class ConcurrentModificationException extends io.vrap.rmf.base.client.error.ConcurrentModificationException
017        implements ErrorResponseException {
018    private final ErrorResponse errorResponse;
019    private final Long currentVersion;
020
021    public ConcurrentModificationException(final int statusCode, final String body, final ApiHttpHeaders headers,
022            final String message, final ApiHttpResponse<byte[]> response) {
023        super(statusCode, body, headers, message, response);
024        errorResponse = getBodyAs(ErrorResponse.class);
025        currentVersion = retrieveCurrentVersion(errorResponse);
026    }
027
028    public ConcurrentModificationException(final int statusCode, final String body, final ApiHttpHeaders headers,
029            final String message, ApiHttpResponse<byte[]> response, ApiHttpRequest request) {
030        super(statusCode, body, headers, message, response, request);
031        errorResponse = getBodyAs(ErrorResponse.class);
032        currentVersion = retrieveCurrentVersion(errorResponse);
033    }
034
035    public ConcurrentModificationException(final int statusCode, final String body, final ApiHttpHeaders headers,
036            final String message, final ApiHttpResponse<byte[]> response, final ResponseSerializer serializer) {
037        super(statusCode, body, headers, message, response, serializer);
038        errorResponse = getBodyAs(ErrorResponse.class);
039        currentVersion = retrieveCurrentVersion(errorResponse);
040    }
041
042    public ConcurrentModificationException(final int statusCode, final String body, final ApiHttpHeaders headers,
043            final String message, final ApiHttpResponse<byte[]> response, final ApiHttpRequest request,
044            final ResponseSerializer serializer) {
045        super(statusCode, body, headers, message, response, request, serializer);
046        errorResponse = getBodyAs(ErrorResponse.class);
047        currentVersion = retrieveCurrentVersion(errorResponse);
048    }
049
050    @Override
051    public ErrorResponse getErrorResponse() {
052        return errorResponse;
053    }
054
055    public Long getCurrentVersion() {
056        return currentVersion;
057    }
058
059    public static Long retrieveCurrentVersion(final ErrorResponse errorResponse) {
060        return errorResponse.getErrors()
061                .stream()
062                .filter(errorObject -> errorObject instanceof ConcurrentModificationError)
063                .findFirst()
064                .map(errorObject -> ((ConcurrentModificationError) errorObject).getCurrentVersion())
065                .orElse(null);
066    }
067}
